text: 1.7: 1 T 6.4; 6.20; Ta 1.10Mbe Moses suaŋgi tɨvir harigi gumgi khɨvɨrgeŋ vuzvugiap, mbe khɨvi. Mbe mbe khɨvav khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi, nza nzuai buni nta guigi guarara. Mbe maaŋ nzuav, mbe nduarira wari wo nzuai buni, mbe nta nɨɨŋge kaŋgi fhuvara. Mbe vhɨra, mbe nduarira wari wo nzuai buni, mbe nta kaŋgi fhu.
